Heading: Paper Sleeve Gluing & Folding Machine
Description: The Paper Cup Sleeve Forming Machine is designed to form paper/cardboard sleeves, essential for providing insulation to paper cups commonly used in the beverage industry. This machine executes a series of automated functions including paper feeding, pre-folding, alignment adjustments, and folding, culminating in the conveying of the final product. Utilizing insulated, generally corrugated fluted paper, this machine enhances the functionality of paper cups by adding a layer of insulation that protects users from the heat of the beverage.
Imgdesc: This robust machine integrates an auto-controlled conveyor system that efficiently feeds and transports the paper. The pre-folding knife assists in the initial folds, followed by the application of water-based cold glue and subsequent folding to create a secure snap-in sleeve. These sleeves are versatile and compatible with a wide range of paper cups and glasses, varying in size and volume. The resulting product significantly improves comfort and safety for users, ensuring the paper cup can hold hot beverages without discomfort.

In the fast-paced Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) industry, the Paper Cup Sleeve Forming Machine has proven to be highly effective. Its ability to produce at a speed of 300m/min and handle paper GSM ranging from 200 to 600 makes it a vital tool in the operations of large brands like Starbucks. This machine not only boosts production efficiency but also supports environmental sustainability with its use of water-based, cold glue systems.
ImageDescription: Discover the versatility of our Carton Erecting Machine, an automatic solution specialized in crafting a wide array of paper boxes essential for the food service industry. This machine is ideal for producing various types of cartons including hamburger boxes, children's lunch boxes, French fries boxes, fried chicken boxes, triangular pizza boxes, and more, tailored for the quick-service sector. Equipped with a PLC intelligent control system, the machine ensures precise operations and efficiency, bolstered by a sturdy structure that delivers low noise levels and high operational speed.
